title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 564.5 - Accidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 564.5 - Accidents

State Regulations

All motor vehicle accidents on campus which cause any
personal and/or property damage, however minor, must be reported to University

Police, who will conduct an investigation or refer the accident to the
appropriate law enforcement agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
564.5

Amended

New

York State Register May 8, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 19, eff. 5/8/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
